sentence: On Sunday, Rep. Jim Jordan (R-Ohio), the top Republican on the House Judiciary Committee, said the latest filing proves Trump’s claim that “there was spying going on.” “It was worse than we thought because they were spying on the sitting ?president of the United States,” Jordan told “Fox & Friends.” “And it goes right to the Clinton campaign.

title: McCarthy says GOP will probe John Durham findings if it wins back House
